<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="88588" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="88588" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.12</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="2186">2,186</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="605"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Vanilla Sex</b> by <b>Tom Ford</b> is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. <b>Vanilla Sex</b> was launched in 2023. Top note is Bitter Almond; middle notes are Vanilla and Floral Notes; base notes are Vanilla Absolute, Ultravanil, Tonka Bean and Sandalwood. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>This fragrance belongs to the warm and spicy family, offering warmth and sweetness within the gourmand category. It featuresnotes of vanilla tincture and vanilla absolute, harmoniously balanced with sandalwood, creating an inviting and comforting olfactory experience.</p>

<p>Vanilla Tincture India, an ingredient explicitly created for Vanilla Sex, exudes a soft sensuality. Vanilla reveals a pristine glamour, warmed by mysterious florals and bitter almond essence. A timeless sandalwood quality mingles with enticing tonka absolute and an exquisite Ultravanil molecule. </p>

<p><strong>A Symphony of Vanilla Notes:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li><strong>Vanilla CO2 Extract:</strong>Immediate allure meets refined elegance, setting the stage for a scent journey.</li>
	<li><strong>Vanilla Tincture India:</strong>Crafted exclusively for TOM FORD, it wraps the senses in a soft, evocative embrace.</li>
	<li><strong>Vanilla Absolute:</strong>Dark, mysterious, and irresistibly deep, it adds a sultry dimension that lingers in memory.</li>
</ul>



<p><strong>Notes:</strong> Vanilla Tincture, Vanilla Absolute, Floral Notes, Bitter Almond, Sandalwood, Tonka Bean Absolute,Ultravanil</p>

<p>Available in 30ml and 50ml Eau de Parfum.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a </fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="88588"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.130.jpg" style="width: 4.7rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Almond-130.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Bitter Almond</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.74.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Vanilla-74.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Vanilla</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.314.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Floral-Notes-314.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Floral Notes</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.74.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Vanilla-74.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Vanilla Absolute</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.1522.jpg" style="width: 4.425rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Ultravanil--1522.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Ultravanil</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.97062997469004; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.73.jpg" style="width: 3.775rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Tonka-Bean-73.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Tonka Bean</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.84529946162075; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.33.jpg" style="width: 3rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Sandalwood-33.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Sandalwood</div></div></div>

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2360019" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nanalvzpink"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1370343"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1370343.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nanalvzpink" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Lost-Cherry-51411.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51411.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lost Cherry"title="Lost Cherry"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2360019ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2360019" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1370343">Nanalvzpink</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-24">11/24/24 13:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am not even kidding but the opening smells just like a cat litter and it lingers for a while! <br />
It gets better but I am NOT going to sit through that awful opening.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2360019"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2360019#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2359325" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2359325" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="wavygod"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1391733"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1391733.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="wavygod" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2359325ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2359325" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1391733">wavygod</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-23">11/23/24 22:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its Not as Bad as the Reviews Say<br />
<br />
I recently purchased a 2ml sample of Vanilla Sex, and honestly, its nowhere near as bad as some reviews make it out to be. It seems like people either expected a groundbreaking vanilla fragrance or their noses arent accustomed to more unique compositions. This might explain why some describe it as plasticky or even urine-like. Also, lets not forget how much skin chemistry plays a role in how a fragrance performs and smellsits a critical factor to keep in mind when reviewing or trying a scent.<br />
<br />
So, what does Vanilla Sex actually smell like? Right off the bat, youre hit with a sweet, gourmand vanilla. As it dries down, the sweetness tones down, revealing its powdery facets and, yes, the urine quality that many have complained about. Personally, I dont find it unbearable. Maybe Ive grown used to this type of note after dealing with Sadonasoanother polarizing fragrance that initially smelled terrible to me but aged beautifully over time. While the piss nuance is definitely present in Vanilla Sex, it feels intentional and even tolerable, playing into the provocative Sex theme of the fragrance. And honestly, the controversy over the name itself is unnecessaryits just a name guys, Lol. <br />
<br />
As for performance, the powdery, sweet floral vanilla remains consistent throughout the fragrances 8-9 hour lifespan on my skin. I cant speak on projection, but Id guess its moderate. In conclusion, Vanilla Sex is a solid fragrance. Many of the harsh critiques seem exaggerated, whether about the name or the scent itself. My advice? Dont rely on those critiques as honestsample it yourself and form your own conclusion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2359325"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2359325#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2355375" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2355375" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HappyCanadianGuy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2115863"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="HappyCanadianGuy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2355375ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2355375" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); You walk pass her and caught a whiff of that light but so alluring, its cozy, fluffy and so intrigued</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2353936"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2353936#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2352590" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I can't smell any urine - It probably depends on the PH of the skin. This is the first perfume in years that I bought a second bottle. I usually don't even finish the first one. That was also the case with TF Lost cherry, Electric cherry, Bitter peach, Soleil neige. After a while I start to dislike perfumes - except for Chloe Chloe, which I love, but can't wear because my husband can't stand it on me. I finally found a perfume that I really like and not just a perfume that I don't mind so much...like before. A warm, soft, intimate scent, nothing sharp, vulgar, aggressive. So... give it a chance :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2351735"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2351735#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2351237" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2350539" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Legsmom1984"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1568803"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1568803.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Legsmom1984" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/Orange-Bitters-41360.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41360.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Orange Bitters"title="Orange Bitters"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2350539ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2350539" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1568803">Legsmom1984</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-15">11/15/24 21:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I LMAO reading the pages and pages and pages of reviews on TF Vanilla Sex. Such a deep chasm between our opinions! Its love/hate with little inbetween. TF must love the controversy over his product! I am a 73 yo female with an incredible perfume addiction and collection. Very very few fragrances have  a profile like this. It is definitely appropriately named Vanilla Sex. I find it very sexy and erotic but only time will tell if other people find it sexy smelling on me. Given the extreme opinions, some will think I need to bathe and others might want to bathe with me. Its a genius masterpiece IMHO!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2350539"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2350539#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2349047" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2349047" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vanilla_Kitty13"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2313540"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2313540.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vanilla_Kitty13" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Commodity/Milk-70012.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70012.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Milk +"title="Milk +"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2349047ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2349047" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2313540">Vanilla_Kitty13</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-14">11/14/24 13:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wanted to like this. I sniffed it a few times on paper and loved it. It's a sweet, soft vanilla extract-y, slightly synthetic scent on paper. After reading reviews saying it was different on skin I sprayed it on my arm. It smelled nice on opening, a nice vanilla. However, within 15 minutes it became this weird funky smell. I thought people were being dramatic by saying it smells like piss but it's true. Smells like vanilla and unflushed toilets. I don't understand it. very sad 2/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2349047"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2349047#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2344936" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2014216">joophommewarrior</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-26">10/26/24 06:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's so addictive y'all trippin fr</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2328128"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2328128#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2326714" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2326714" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ejayne64"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2298067"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ejayne64" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2326714ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2326714" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2298067">ejayne64</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-24">10/24/24 19:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Should be called Almond Sex. Haven't sampled this on my skin, but couldn't even bring myself to test it on test strip. This had the potential to be a lovely, sweet, creamy well blended vanilla with some warmth from the choice of almond and sandalwood/tonka bean. It smelt nothing like I'd hoped for. Disappointing and not something I feel is comparable to the primarily consistent, high quality, deep blends in the rest of the line.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2326714"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2326714#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2324780" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2324780" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nigel91"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/594767"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nigel91" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Sable-Or-31210.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31210.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sable Or"title="Sable Or"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2324780ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2324780" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/594767">Nigel91</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-23">10/23/24 06:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bois farine with Civet/honey base</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2324780"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2324780#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2323889" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2323889" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vanilla.skies"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1429248"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1429248.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="vanilla.skies" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Rose-D-Amalfi-71538.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71538.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rose D'Amalfi"title="Rose D'Amalfi"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2323889ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2323889" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1429248">vanilla.skies</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-22">10/22/24 10:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Was lucky enough to buy a 50ml for half price because someone got gifted this and didnt want it. Tested it a few times before buying. Could be signature scent worthy! But it might not be safe for that just because so many people smell it differently.<br />
<br />
It is a delicious strong almond, milky and vanilla scent, it has a subtle but beautiful layer of florals that I cant pinpoint, it has a unique saltiness, and animalic-ness to it- which to some noses might be why people go as far as to say they smell the bathroom. But all I smell is a slight funk, something that adds complexity and ..humanness to the fragrance, like an accent on a piece of jewellery, like a chic signature, and I love it. I understand where the carnal reference arises, but it doesnt directly make me think of any excrements. Something noteworthy, this perfume puts me in a You dont have to like me, you can even hate me, I just love myself so much mood. <br />
<br />
I find it to be more unique and right for me than many other vanilla centric fragrances Ive tried.<br />
Why I like this:<br />
-So much vanilla, and so much almond, and a little funk. Not very sweet.<br />
-This is the TF frag that speaks to me enough for me to crave a bottle. Ive tried the current rendition of Vanille Fatale and I like VS better  Will get myself a Soleil Blanc decant. Tobacco Vanille is too edgy for me. <br />
-reference point for my vanillic preference (if it even says anything here because this has so much almond too): I love Ex Idolo Love &amp; Crime, Jovoy Paris Remember Me, Dior Addict (old formulation), Van Cleef &amp; Arpels Orchidee Vanille, YSL Babycat.<br />
<br />
Longevity &amp; sillage: for me this is not a powerhouse but it is not faint. Quite perfect for me somedays.<br />
Sillage is half an arms length or more to my nose. I would appreciate a bit more sillage in later wear knowing the $$$ but longevity of the skin scent is still good 9-10 hours in.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2323889"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2323889#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2323289" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Vanilla Sex smells like straight up play dough.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2323289"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2323289#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2321441" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2145960">I5h</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-19">10/19/24 23:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Heres another one that seems to spark controversy... which, naturally, makes me even more curious. Hopefully, its more "wow" than "what have I done?"</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2321441"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2321441#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2321264" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Tom Ford always makes the most basic perfumes overpriced; no shame (kinda). <br />
It smells like vanilla and is a bit powderynot much else to say.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2321264"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2321264#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2320479" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2320479" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fruit-chan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1127645"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1127645.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fruit-chan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Coco-Mademoiselle-611.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.611.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Coco Mademoiselle"title="Coco Mademoiselle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2320479ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2320479" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1127645">Fruit-chan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-19">10/19/24 02:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The alcohol note doesnt fade right away with  this one.It takes around 1 minute,then it smells like almond liquor,it has a heavy old lady powedy "pissy" stage that lasts about 10 minutes,then its this playdough,plasticky bitter sweet vanillic scent like baby food,smashed vanilla cookies and almond paste.<br />
It's very synthetic.Lasts forever and gets a bit better,but its definetely far from the dreamy vanilla scent I expected this would be from the notes listed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2320479"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2320479#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2319240" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2318947" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Wee keavo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2114814"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2114814.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Wee keavo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/By-the-Fireplace-31623.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31623.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="By the Fireplace"title="By the Fireplace"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2318947ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2318947" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2114814">Wee keavo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-17">10/17/24 12:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For the first couple of seconds after you spray this it smells like rubbing alcohol but don't worry that quickly faded away, after that's gone it turns into a sugery almond and vanilla heavy scent.<br />
Not much else I can say but that's it<br />
Decent performance also</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2318947"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2318947#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2318782" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2318782" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LB152"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/208950"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.208950.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LB152" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Frederic-Malle/Portrait-of-a-Lady-10464.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10464.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Portrait of a Lady"title="Portrait of a Lady"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2318782ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2318782" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/208950">LB152</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-17">10/17/24 10:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is actually pretty sexy. It opens with a full bodied and sugary almond note that settles down into a soft skin scent. The kind of smell I imagine men remember after making love to their dream girl for the first time on a warm summer night. Its light, feminine, flirty, but also mildly slutty. Its the scent a girl leaves behind, before her man realizes hes fallen in love overnight. I imagine, hell eventually crave the scent, because of the comforting memory of their first night, before the kids and before the fights and will have flashbacks to comfort himself when shes gone.<br />
<br />
Its really sweet and has a similar vibe to SKIN by Clean.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2318782"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2318782#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2318686" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2318686" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gourmandivi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2031229"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2031229.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gourmandivi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kayali-Fragrances/Yum-Boujee-Marshmallow-81-99254.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.99254.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Yum Boujee Marshmallow | 81"title="Yum Boujee Marshmallow | 81"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2318686ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2318686" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2031229">Gourmandivi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-17">10/17/24 08:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Veryyyyy heavy on the almond note, almost smells cherry like, very medicinal to my nose, like kinda giving cough syrup vibes. I do get a beautiful vanilla underneath but the other notes are spoiling it. Its not horrible, I was able to wear it and didnt feel the need to scrub it away, but theres a weird vibe to this perfume. Like all Tom Ford fragrances very week staying power, I got maybe 2h and no sillage. Overall not worth it, specially for the price and Im not in love with the DNA.<br />
FWI: you HAVE to test on skin as this perfume is completely different on paper ( I tried both and the skin chemistry really plays a big role with this one, it smelled *better* on skin but still dont like it).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2318686"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2318686#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2317883" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2317883" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="perfectly_pink"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/637446"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.637446.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="perfectly_pink" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2317883ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2317883" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/637446">perfectly_pink</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-16">10/16/24 13:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I couldnt wait to smell this perfume when it first launched, Im a vanilla fragrance fan and I had high expectations of this one. I was disappointed when I first smelt it and wrote the fragrance off. Months later I randomly tried it again having no expectation and my opinion completely changed. I now enjoy and own vanilla sex. <br />
<br />
Within those months after first smelling vanilla sex, I had smelt true vanilla essential oil and that is now what I get from vanilla sex. Its rich, earthy, warm vanilla, in its true form. I think this perfume is underrated and misinterpreted due to our expectations of how vanilla should smell. I now view it as a very true and sophisticated representation of a vanilla fragrance that I dont think I was refined enough to understand the first time I smelt it. <br />
<br />
This is just a personal chemistry thing, but I also get compliments when I wear this vanilla in comparison to my other vanillas.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2315251" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iyahhhhh18"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2264929"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="iyahhhhh18" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2315251ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2315251" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2264929">iyahhhhh18</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-14">10/14/24 05:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>people when the sex perfume named sex perfume smells like sex<br />
EDIT: okay so serious review now. This is a gorgeous sophisticated vanilla and almond ice cream fragrance with florals and bodily fluids in the background. Definitely lives up to its name. It's not like any other gourmand perfume I have in my collection, but it is very nice and strange at the same time. The bodily fluids/piss (although I don't think it smells like piss imo it just smells more like pussy but not the smelly kind) notes honestly shocked me but the shock turned into amusement soon enough because well. What are you gonna expect from a perfume called VANILLA SEX</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2315251"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2315251#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2314852" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2314852" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jrhaltom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1455582"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1455582.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jrhaltom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-7-Virtues/Amber-Vanilla-90294.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90294.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amber Vanilla"title="Amber Vanilla"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2314852ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2314852" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1455582">jrhaltom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-13">10/13/24 17:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The tester of this fragrance was empty at my local sephora, so I asked them to grab another to try. They warned me that it smells really bad to most people and they weren't wrong. To be fair, I only tested it on the paper strip they sprayed it on, but my first impression was childrens cherry cough syrup from the early 2000s. A few minutes later I got notes of spoiled milk. I'm not sure what's going on with this one or if it would test differently on the skin, but I would be terrified to even try based on that previous encounter :/</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Massive disappointment.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2314198"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2314198#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2313919" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1804744">Enikom2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-12">10/12/24 21:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This one is very interesting. At first i did not like it, it was a very strong coying vanilla. I never got piss or vagina scent others describe this (someone said they didnt like how their vagina smelled. I happened to like mine but this scent is not that lol). Its a gourmand, sweet, pure vanilla scent on me. Similar to laura mercier amber vanilla body cream I use or madagascar vanilla bean paste. I enjoy this after showering layering with mercier. Its lovely and comforting</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2313919"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2313919#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2310366" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2310366" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JuliaToothFairy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2026472"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2026472.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JuliaToothFairy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2310366ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2310366" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2026472">JuliaToothFairy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-09">10/09/24 14:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Vanilla Sex smells like it never had sex. This perfume should be called "Sex in the Public Toilet". <br />
When I smelled this for the first time, I didn't read anything about it. My first thought was that it smelled like vanilla, vanilla ice cream, milk, almonds like the ones in Sol Cheriosa 62 and... toilet paper? Wet and dirty toilet paper. In a public toilet, not the one at your home, your home would never smell like this. A gas station bathroom.<br />
I thought it's just something in it that's just not for me. I was amused and surprised to read afterwards that many people can smell urine and dirty toilet in this fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2310366"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2310366#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2309247" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2308802" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cocolikechanel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2234209"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2234209.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cocolikechanel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2308802ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2308802" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2234209">cocolikechanel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-08">10/08/24 07:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My 17 y/o sister got this as a birthday present recently and smelling it on her, does exactly what it says on the tin, pure sweet vanilla! Not my style but she loves it and it definitely has a strong room presence. <br />
Vanilla as a scent recently went viral and is popular amongst teenagers now, smells nice and all but if you want to smell like something other than hummingbird bakery, I'd choose something a bit more complex.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2308802"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2308802#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2305108" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2305108" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tonileefiore"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/130950"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.130950.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tonileefiore" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2305108ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2305108" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/130950">tonileefiore</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-04">10/04/24 16:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I recently reignited an interest in locating a unique, well-blended, vanilla-forward fragrance. I am not necessarily searching for an uber-gourmand vanilla fragrance. But I do hope for something warm, enveloping, inviting, comforting.  <br />
<br />
Among a few other fragrances, someone suggested I try TF Vanilla Sex.<br />
<br />
To me, this opens as a rather bitter, prominent "bitter almond" note that projects strongly straight out of the gate. The almond opening is followed by a whisper of vanilla, which attempts to morph and blend with the opening. I would say the vanilla is more "vanilla extract" type versus anything vanilla baked.<br />
<br />
That's about it. Bitter almond and a vanilla extract notes just as the manufacturer lists.<br />
<br />
This is definitely a hard pass for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2305108"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2305108#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2301584" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2301584" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PerfumePonderings"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1681029"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="PerfumePonderings" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2301584ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2301584" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1681029">PerfumePonderings</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-01">10/01/24 14:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Some of the negative reviews on here are unnecessarily graphic. That said, I did think this smelled gross and animalic. Worse than Vanilla Milk but not quite as bad as Absolute Aphrodisiac. <br />
<br />
The price is just hilarious.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2301584"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2301584#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2301509" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2301509" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Perpetual Collector"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1297099"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1297099.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Perpetual Collector" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Elixir-Charnel-Gourmand-Coquin-4675.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4675.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Elixir Charnel Gourmand Coquin"title="Elixir Charnel Gourmand Coquin"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2301509ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2301509" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); Bravo!<br />
On a more serious note, if you don't like a fume, there is no need to ruin it for people who do by associating it with your favorite hobby. You can just say that you didn't like it and move on.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2301509"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2301509#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2301076" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Luckily I sold mine, feel bad for the buyer</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2301076"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2301076#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2299187" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2299187" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Palmer Eldritch"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1202620"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1202620.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Palmer Eldritch" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Mayar-84309.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84309.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mayar"title="Mayar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2299187ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2299187" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1202620">Palmer Eldritch</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-29">09/29/24 12:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A lot of reviews mention dirty toilets and cat pee, Sadly they are right. <br />
This is powdery vanilla pee from start to finish. Very heavy, ammonia, pee.<br />
<br />
It's been a long while since I've been utterly repulsed by a fragrance, some would say skin chemistry, but I've tried it on 3 other people and we all got vanilla powder mixed with repugnant urine. <br />
<br />
Be warned.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2299187"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2299187#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2298545" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Bought a full size bottle and trying to go through quick, which I probably can because I constantly need to spray myself every 30 minutes to get somewhat of a lingering scent.<br />

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2293124" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mydearaurora"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2120759"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2120759.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mydearaurora" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2293124ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2293124" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2263774">Princesss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-23">09/23/24 01:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The closest thing I can say it smells like is, oatmeal or cream of wheat, thats all I could get from it but it also has like this very odd scent along with it. I cant tell if I like it or not. Someone in the reviews also said it smells like rotten milk and I can definitely see why. It does give off a warm rotten milk smell if you think about it. But yea, It definitely stands out from anything Ive ever smelt before thats forssure..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2292119"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2292119#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2291887" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
