padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2181280">marx1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-22">09/22/24 18:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like straight-up urine</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2291887"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2291887#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2291355" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2291355" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gemsense"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1157351"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1157351.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gemsense" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nest/Madagascar-Vanilla-Perfume-Oil-66886.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66886.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Madagascar Vanilla Perfume Oil"title="Madagascar Vanilla Perfume Oil"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2291355ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2291355" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1157351">Gemsense</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-22">09/22/24 07:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Something I learned looking up the difference between bitter almond and sweet almond. Bitter almond has a cherry smell to it, sweet almond is that sweet almond smell we know and come to expect. This has bitter almond, hence the cherry smell.<br />
 Bitter almond is also poisonous so it must be used sparingly in fragrances and not at all in skincare.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2291355"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2291355#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2290054" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2290054" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kankuro"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1172878"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1172878.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kankuro" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Infusion-d-Iris-2015-31040.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31040.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Infusion d'Iris (2015)"title="Infusion d'Iris (2015)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2290054ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2290054" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1172878">Kankuro</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-21">09/21/24 00:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you think Vanilla Sex is animalic and offensive smelling, please never try 'A Une Madone' by Pierre Guillaume. Why? Well, Vanilla Sex smells like a tamer version of the Pierre Guillaume fragrance. Yes, there is an animalic tone to the Vanilla, which is of course a nice addition to a scent which features the word 'sex' in its title. Nicely done, and not too dirty for my taste. Sweet Vanilla, playdough almond and some 'dirt'. Love it! A Une Madone on the other hand has the same vibe, but MUCH more dirty and animalic. Don't get me wrong, I find A Une Madone to be fantastic, and wore it for some time. But after a while, it was a little too much for me, so I am glad to have found Vanilla Sex as a more 'vanilla' version of that bold fragrance ;-)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2290054"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2290054#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2289917" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2284504" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Detman101"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1374575"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1374575.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Detman101" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Jasoor-85093.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.85093.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jasoor"title="Jasoor"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2284504ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2284504" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1374575">Detman101</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-16">09/16/24 06:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Coming back to eat my words...yet again.<br />
Decided I had nothing to lose...<br />
Put the bottle in the fridge overnight with a few others...<br />
12 hours...removed it<br />
Let it warm up to room temperature...cleared out the tube.<br />
Sprayed on back of my hand.<br />
Vanilla amplified...Almond note smoother...creaminess amplified...<br />
No more underlying current of urea/pissy-note.<br />
Don't know if longevity amplified but projection is the same as before...beastly.<br />
I may have to save up for another bottle of this...my clone doesn't perform like this.<br />
Dangit...I'm angry that this has become as good as it has...because it costs so darn much.<br />
<br />
&gt;=[</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2284504"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2284504#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2283575" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1872889">Xm7nka</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-15">09/15/24 08:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The first word was your standard vanilla almond, then I got that mixed with toilet/ urinal cake??</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; The best vanilla I have ever smelt.<br />
Lasts whole day with a strong projection. <br />
10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2283488"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2283488#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2281958" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2281958" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Paddibear"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1480899"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1480899.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Paddibear" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Dama-Bianca-15555.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15555.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dama Bianca"title="Dama Bianca"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2281958ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2281958" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); Save your money and get HP instead. Tom Ford is overrated and most certainly overpriced!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2281958"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2281958#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2281285" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2281285" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dan99"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1535209"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1535209.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dan99" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Herod-16939.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16939.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Herod"title="Herod"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2281285ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2281285" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1535209">dan99</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-13">09/13/24 05:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is incredibly underrated in my opinion. It took a few months of wearing and maceration for me to appreciate this fragrance fully. It is deceptively strong and throws far in scent projection but its at the same time light and airy. The scent itself is very good. I get almonds and powdery vanilla with a playdough aspect which I actually like because it gives a feeling of cleanliness about it but there's a small little contrast by dirtiness in the background but its very faint to my nose. Its a beautiful composition that is wildly misunderstood.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2281285"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2281285#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2281024" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2280763" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LostSock"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1500461"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1500461.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LostSock" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-pour-Homme-2003-691.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.691.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gucci pour Homme (2003)"title="Gucci pour Homme (2003)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2280763ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2280763" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1500461">LostSock</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-12">09/12/24 15:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like a really expensive ice cream that's made with proper vanilla pods and not cheap essence. It's lovely. Not something I'd wear myself as it's just a bit girly and too sweet, but it's a gorgeous scent. On a pretty woman this would be phenomenal, and I'd definitely be thinking of the latter word.<br />
<br />
To my future wife. Wear this on one side of your neck and a bit of Coco Mademoiselle on the other and I'll already be picking rings before you say hello.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2280763"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2280763#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2280698" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2280698" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="madelineandmore"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1732864"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1732864.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="madelineandmore" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Side-Effect-42260.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42260.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Side Effect"title="Side Effect"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2280698ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2280698" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1732864">madelineandmore</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-12">09/12/24 14:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I surprisingly really like vanilla sex<br />
Its different thats for sure but in a good way <br />
Powdery sweet vanilla with a musky, rubbery facet. <br />
I only sprayed this on paper so on skin I know this way behave differently, but this morning I went into my living room and the whole room smelt like musky vanilla just from the paper strip! <br />
It reminds me of a body powder I got from lush once.<br />
It was a vanilla, tonka, jasmine, ylang-ylang body powder.<br />
While tropical florals arent listed here I do smell them, especially their animalic nature. <br />
I also smelt a lot of bitter almond in the beginning but now not so much. <br />
Im very keen to try this on my skin now!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2280698"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2280698#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2279851" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2279851" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="collinmeek"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1610010"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1610010.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="collinmeek" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Glossier/You-Reve-97604.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.97604.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="You Rve"title="You Rve"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2279851ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2279851" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1610010">collinmeek</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-11">09/11/24 22:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tried this when it first came out and hated it. I sort of thought it smelled rushed, unbalanced, and a little foul, too. Maybe because it was new and unfamiliar? I hadn't smelled anything with this DNA before and hadn't smelled another vanilla perfume like it. I had nothing to compare it to. Cut to now, I truly don't know what has happened in the last few months before revisiting this. My tastes have caught up, though, and now I'm hooked. <br />
<br />
When I first spray it, I get this sour cherry benzaldehyde smell. I originally identified this note as almond-like, but it's so incredibly adjacent to cherry that one may mistake the smell for either note during the first 30 seconds. As it starts to dry, I get a heart note of oriental lilies for some reason (am I crazy?). This makes me wonder if lily is one of the nondescript "floral notes" that are credited in the composition. I guess we'll never know, lol. The full dry-down is suuuuper addicting. I can't stop smelling my wrists in the recent times I've tried this. I'd compare it to a raw, nutty, vanilla cookie-dough texture. It's grainy the way raw cookie dough is, too. <br />
<br />
One thing that's identifiable about Tom Ford perfumes is that they're incredibly vivid and a little funky/animalic. This one is no exception and I understand why some are saying it's crowd-pleasing and frictionless, and why others are saying it smells like sweat, urine, and vanilla car-freshener. This one dances on that line pretty well and I think that's why I keep coming back to it. Really compelling. 8/10 :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2279851"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2279851#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2279082" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2279082" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sodastream83"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1364843"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1364843.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sodastream83" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2279082ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2279082" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1364843">Sodastream83</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-11">09/11/24 07:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like Baileys Irish cream and I love it so much!<br />
However...<br />
all you people saying this smells like urine (and even toilet paper, wth?) make me feel like there is something wrong with my sense of smell and with me for loving this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2279082"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2279082#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2277742" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2277724" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PierreLouis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1169766"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1169766.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PierreLouis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Pegasus-16938.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16938.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pegasus"title="Pegasus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2277724ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2277724" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1169766">PierreLouis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-10">09/10/24 02:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A dirty toilet that you try to make better spraying air freshener when you have unexpected guests and you're panicking. Really if you can't smell the stale urine in this your nose is not at full best. As usual it's possible not being able to smell a note but it's impossible to smell something that's not there</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2277724"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2277724#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2272489" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2272489" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stinky777xd"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2234230"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2234230.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="stinky777xd" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2272489ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2272489" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2234230">stinky777xd</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-05">09/05/24 08:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ok on the initial application I was worried its more like vanilla r*** but its much more palatable after the first hour or so. It layers well with my more masculine perfumes like fucking fabulous or ombre leather to give a femme twist. Also even after 12-14 hours of very sweaty sleep and activity at 90 and humid weather the fragrance not only held up but smells better with that human twist? It isn't my favourite alone but I can see myself buying this to layer it with others.<br />
<br />
It definitely reminds me of an almond croissant.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2272489"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2272489#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2269680" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2269680" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="balisonqs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2195794"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2195794.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="balisonqs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88588.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla Sex"title="Vanilla Sex"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2269680ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2269680" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2195794">balisonqs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-02">09/02/24 23:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought this today after wearing a sample out and about on my skin in the humid, hot weather at 80 or so degrees. It smelled amazing on me, and my friend kept smelling me to make sure I wasnt just being delusional. To me, this smelt like natural vanilla beans, not the extreme synthetic syrupy smell you can find in other vanilla perfumes that remind me of a Starbucks.<br />
<br />
It is not obscenely strong, but you will definitely smell vanilla with a hint of almond like a well made pastry. Its mellow but present, and as it dries down it remains a strong calm vanilla. Its initial smell reminded me of old people (not necessarily derogatory), but after the dry down it felt like a more grown up adult version of many of the vanilla scents I grew up smelling amongst the girls in my class who would be obsessed with drenching themselves in warm vanilla scents that smelled too alcohol-y and cheap. Thats good, because they took the best parts and made it a classier version.<br />
<br />
I dont understand where people are smelling rancid milk or urine or body fluids Maybe its just the way it was on me that turned out good??<br />
<br />
EDIT:<br />
I just got a new laptop. I can just say that, the sweet smell of new technology smells exactly like Tom Ford's Vanilla Sex. I'm happy to smell like a out of the box laptop HAHAHAHA LOL<br />
<br />
I'm not joking either. Look up "sweet smell electronics", there's a sweet smell that comes off from the heat and adhesives on new technology after being powered on for the first time. I was trying to recognize why the sweetness in the box smelled so familiar and I smelled my wrist and they're pretty damn similar. I think it's the bitterness of the almond combining with the vanilla to make a buzzing kind of smell (that's the only way I can describe it), which is near the same as the "sweet" smell from tech.<br />
<br />
Also, if you think yours smells more like musk / fluids, I got a bottle from the mail from a seller online and I can definitely say I see what you're saying now. Try letting your bottle sit for a day or two. I sprayed mine immediately onto my wrist to see if it was authentic and it worried me because I couldn't smell the vanilla (which was usually stronger, from my other bottle). Turns out you should probably let the perfume you get, sit for a little at room temp. The bottle was authentic so no worries but I did get to see what the fluids / musk / urine thing was about.. Without the vanilla, it definitely kinda smells like a post-cleaned public bathroom. So for the love of god, LET YOUR PERFUME SIT</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2269680"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2269680#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2269517" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2269517" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="OTA Mom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/261021"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.261021.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="OTA Mom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Strangers-Parfumerie/Yue-Tu-88777.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88777.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Yue Tu"title="Yue Tu"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2269517ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2269517" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/261021">OTA Mom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-02">09/02/24 18:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I loved the vanilla/almond opening, but it does not last and what I'm left with very quickly just smells like warm skin.  Pleasant enough but I'm not paying $$$ for something so blase.  In any case, I don't detect any of the fetid, bodily fluid(!), or rancid notes that so many others have noted, and I'm scared enough to never wear this in case others detect what I cannot.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2072403">WinstonIsCool</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-29">08/29/24 16:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this fragrance disappointed me, the bitter almond is too much 4/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2265168"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2265168#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2264659" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2264659" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Coffeeandscents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1383663"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1383663.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Coffeeandscents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Baccarat-Rouge-540-33519.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.33519.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Baccarat Rouge 540"title="Baccarat Rouge 540"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2264659ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2264659" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1383663">Coffeeandscents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-29">08/29/24 07:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As a vanilla lover I was planning on splurging on this. Luckily I tested it first. It starts off as a nice basic vanilla. It dries down to be a very repulsive barnyard hay, funky rotten milk, smell that I scrubbed off of my arm and it tried to linger. Beware spraying this on skin!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2264659"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2264659#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2263996" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2263996" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Autumn_Moon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1496569"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1496569.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Autumn_Moon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1825.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tobacco Vanille"title="Tobacco Vanille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2263996ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2263996" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1496569">Autumn_Moon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-28">08/28/24 14:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've been on something of an "explore the wide variety of vanilla scents" kick lately, so it was probably only a matter of time before I happened upon this one.<br />
<br />
The description would seem to imply vanilla, vanilla, and more vanilla.  The marketing (or, at the very least, the name of the perfume) seemed to suggest something safe, banal, even... bland?  (For a Tom Ford scent to market itself as "plain old" *anything* was unusual, but that did appear to be the case in this instance.)  <br />
<br />
I asked myself, "OK, so what do I *expect* this fragrance to be?"  Based solely upon the notes, I figured that Vanilla Sex would turn into something resembling a 1990s vanilla body mist.  Not bad, not groundbreaking, and also not likely to veer off-course and switch things up.  "Linear" and "predictable" were the words that came to mind when I imagined what it might smell like.    <br />
<br />
That was not exactly what I experienced.<br />
<br />
In the sample vial, almond was the most prominent note, and I could tell that vanilla was definitely in the picture, as well.  (I was fine with that; I was rather fond of the almond note.)  However, this perfume became a *whole* different story once it hit my skin.  <br />
<br />
Sadly, the almond did *not* stick around for more than a few minutes; it was only there to beguile me into applying the perfume.  There were a few moments of fuzzy vanilla bliss, and then... boom!  Florals!  A bouquet of various floral notes emerged!  (This was not *bad* -- I like a lot of floral fragrances -- but it was also not what I was anticipating.)  This became a full-on floral perfume on me, with the merest hints of vanilla in the background.  As it developed, an undertone of something that I can only describe as "decidedly animalic" entered the picture.  It's certainly not in the notes list, but I've worn this perfume twice already, and that animalic note appeared both times.  To be fair, it's not *entirely* unpleasant, and no one recoiled from me in horror while I was out running my errands or tapped me on the shoulder to tell me that I smelled like pee, but I have yet to explicitly *ask* anyone else what they smell when I'm wearing it, so there's that...<br />
<br />
If sandalwood is present, the aforementioned "animalic" note drowned it out.  I didn't pick up on anything resembling sandalwood, that's for sure.<br />
<br />
In terms of performance... this one starts out strong and insistent.  (I was using a dabber, and I found that a tiny amount was sufficient.  I've hardly made a dent in my humble little sample, which is not something I can say of every sample vial that makes it to my wrist.)  However, it settles down after the first hour, and became nothing more than a skin scent to me at around the 4-5 hour mark.<br />
<br />
I'm not sure what I think about this one yet.  I don't despise it enough to refuse to wear it ever again, and the way it shifts into something I didn't expect is... interesting, for sure.  However, I also don't feel compelled to rush out and buy a bottle.  I recommend trying it, just to see what happens, but it's definitely *not* a blind-buy candidate.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2263996"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2263996#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2262143" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2262143" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Creamy_ambrette"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1640057"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1640057.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Creamy_ambrette" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Au-Pays-de-la-Fleur-d-Oranger/Neroli-blanc-Intense-Eau-de-Parfum-18085.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18085.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Neroli blanc Intense Eau de Parfum"title="Neroli blanc Intense Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2262143ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2262143" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1640057">Creamy_ambrette</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-26">08/26/24 21:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells very different in card than on skin. On the card a lot of vanilla comes through and it smells doughy as if lots of Orris root where in the composition. On skin lots of heliotrope comes forward which I believe is what the floral notes are in part. I think this is also the pee note people are claiming they smell. To me this is beautiful heliotrope with an overdose of vanilla. <br />
Will update with a few more wears.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2262143"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2262143#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2260125" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2260125" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FarfarAlex"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1391721"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="FarfarAlex" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanille-Fatale-2024-88659.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88659.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanille Fatale (2024)"title="Vanille Fatale (2024)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2260125ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2260125" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1391721">FarfarAlex</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-24">08/24/24 23:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sad to see all the negative rewievs on this.<br />
<br />
I think this is a very beautiful scent to me, it opens up with a lot of almond but quickly it settles a bit as beautiful vanilla pushes through to mix perfectly with the almond creating a fantastic scent.<br />
<br />
The projection and Silliage is both decent and you get easily 5-6 hours maybe even more. After that it stays as a beautiful vanilla skin scent for very long.<br />
<br />
I really really like this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2260125"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2260125#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2259957" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2259957" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tylermiranda7"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1727152"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tylermiranda7" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2259957ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2259957" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1727152">Tylermiranda7</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-24">08/24/24 18:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Okay this perfume is weird. The first time I tried it, I was repulsed, I thought it smelled like pee, vomit, and rotten milk. Even my gf thought it smelled terrible along with 3 hours of performance, 2/10. Fast forward a few months, we tried it again, and it smelled WAY better. I actually couldn't stop smelling it because it was exactly the type of vanilla fragrance I wanted. Had the perfect bottle design to me, the exact vanilla bean/extract smell, and I even got 10 hours of wear with this. Definitely justified buying it as it was absolutely everything I wanted in a vanilla fragrance. Now I would actually give this a 10/10. Super satisfied with this purchase.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2259957"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2259957#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2256617" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2256617" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="m0userella"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1814300"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1814300.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="m0userella" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2256617ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2256617" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1814300">m0userella</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-21">08/21/24 15:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Maybe I'm just a basic girl, but almost every Tom Ford perfume I smelled was atrocious. This was the worst offender by far. It's got a rotten milk type of scent.. and also like some bitter wood smell. It's very dirty and carsick smelling. Lol, idk how else to describe it but there's alot of perfumes that just smell like being carsick to me. This, American Cream, Vanilla Milk, Rosie Jane and almost every Tom Ford are part of it. It's like the rotten lactonic woody vanillas. I'd hate to be around someone who smells like this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2256617"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2256617#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2254713" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2254713" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="floralfade"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2206575"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2206575.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="floralfade" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zoologist-Perfumes/Rabbit-91167.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91167.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rabbit"title="Rabbit"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2254713ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2254713" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2206575">floralfade</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-19">08/19/24 20:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i remember when i first smelled this (sprayed onto test paper), i really really loved it. i thought the almond note came out so beautifully after initally spraying and it dried down on the paper like a creamy vanilla. i didn't think to test it on my skin at the time, because how could the scent change so drastically?? so, i began to romanticize this perfume. i was obsessed with it. i began a deep dive for any sort of dupe, but i thought that every almond + vanilla perfume i tried wasn't nearly as good as this one. but upon second spray, my mind changed completely.<br />
<br />
in retrospect, idk why i romanticized this fragrance so much lol. when i sprayed it again recently (this time on me), i thought the almond note was plasticky and uncomfortable. nothing like what i had previously smelled. the vanilla note changed that way as well (a smell akin to a vanilla scented garbage bag) and i generally just didn't want to wear the perfume anymore. it made me kinda disappointed because i feel like i had two completely different experiences with the same exact perfume when i had such high expectations after intial test! i guess that shows the importance of spraying something on your skin before purchasing it (not like i was going to purchase anytime soon, it is waaaaaaay out of my budget). <br />
<br />
however, this perfume did teach me that there are plenty of vanilla-forward fragrances with almond notes out there that do it soooo much better than this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2254713"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2254713#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2254005" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2254005" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jellis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2226297"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jellis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2254005ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2254005" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2226297">Jellis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-19">08/19/24 07:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Have Catholic guilt that you want to relieve? Then this perfume is for you - smells IDENTICAL to the Catholic church. I tried this in Sephora and my mom and I both really liked it, to the point where we went back the next day and she bought it for me. It's macerated about 6 months now and all I get is Catholic church :/ Still opens nicely with a strong almond and some vanilla, but it dries down into something musty and medicinal. Tragic because of how much I spent on it and originally liked it and it has great staying power. I am trying to see if I can find any combos that it works in because I want to use it up</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2254005"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2254005#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2253262" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2251236" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="anamawsity"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1997817"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1997817.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="anamawsity" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2251236ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2251236" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1997817">anamawsity</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-16">08/16/24 08:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like burnt rubber with a bit of vanilla thrown in. I dont get any florals, just extremely charred vanilla with a hint of sandalwood and almond. The sour burnt smell does die down a bit after an hour, but it still lingers behind the vanilla. It finally smells decent after 2 hours of wear. Has moderate sillage and lasts about 5 hours. In terms of perfumes listed as similar<br />
 Dior Hypnotic Poison: sweeter and nowhere near as sour<br />
 Ellis Brooklyn Vanilla Milk: has a similar sourness but is much sweeter<br />
 Zara Hypnotic Vanilla: more floral and less sour</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2251236"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2251236#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2246243" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2246243" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="drippKing"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1515934"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="drippKing" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2246243ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2246243" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1515934">drippKing</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-11">08/11/24 18:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Vanilla playdough. Bitterness in the almond is kinda like urinal type oud or some harsh chemical cleaner.  This just shows TF is no longer relevant and is grasping for recognition with salacious naming but they can't even get that right anymore. Vanilla is slang for boring so maybe this is truth in advertising.  Vanilla sex = boring and a disappointment and hopefully over quickly so this fragrance certainly lives up to that.<br />
<br />
King out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2246243"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2246243#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2246215" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The opening is extremely almondy, like a bitter marzipan scent with barely any vanilla. The dry down is awful! It's a strong antiseptic smell, I agree with the other commenter who said it smells like Vicks! For the price point I was very disappointed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2237487"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2237487#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2234786" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2231463" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sumandre"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/207166"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="sumandre" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2231463ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2231463" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/207166">sumandre</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-27">07/27/24 21:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just love the buttery iris in this.  Smells like it is inspired by L'Artisan's Bois Farine. That had a similar peanut butter thing going on. The opening has an almond note that sadly fades too quickly and is overshadowed by what I detect is a lily-like floral... like jasmine.  The sandalwood is Australian and lactonic. The protection is intimate,discrete and inviting, like its okamoss. Dig deep and you might find it, underneath its canopy of  synthetic vanillin. Like Feu D'issy, this is not so much a fragrance,  but a work of art ahead of its time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2231463"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2231463#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2231333" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
