padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2219656" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Duckman882"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1731539"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Duckman882" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2219656ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2219656" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1731539">Duckman882</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-15">07/15/24 18:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Intrigued by the mixed reviews, which I think point to this one being more interesting than some are giving it credit for. It is obviously a vanilla + almond bomb and that note is very full and rich. But there's an edge here, it starts very bitter, a very dirty vanilla, then mellows into something I'd describe finally as "earthy". It's interesting and I think dancing further from the edge of mass appeal than you'd guess. Not something I'd buy, but I will use up these samples.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2219656"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2219656#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2218878" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2215682" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="philosobri"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2191842"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2191842.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="philosobri" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2215682ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2215682" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2191842">philosobri</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-11">07/11/24 16:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am obsessed with this perfume. I got a free sample of it at the Tom Ford counter in Nordstrom and I could bathe in it. It lasts forever, and is a lactonic vanilla with a slightly spicy punch. It's unlike any other vanilla perfume I've smelled. When the counter attendant asked if we wanted to smell it I was hesitant -- vanilla scents aren't ones I typically go for. This made me feel RICH and sexy. If I didn't have to sell a f****** kidney to afford a full-sized bottle I would purchase one immediately.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2215682"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2215682#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2215422" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2211644" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Detman101"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1374575"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1374575.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Detman101" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Jasoor-85093.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.85093.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jasoor"title="Jasoor"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2211644ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2211644" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1374575">Detman101</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-08">07/08/24 04:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is not Vanilla.<br />
This is horrible.<br />
I wish I never bought it.<br />
100% regerts...<br />
<br />
UPDATE:<br />
Okay...This fragrance has to have the loooooooongest drydown-success period of ANY fragrance I've ever bought, owned or made. <br />
LI-TER-A-LLY....9 hours later...it smells like vanilla on my skin. <br />
Prior to that it maintained and sustained as some kinda plasticky funky almondy mish-mash of notes. This frag wins the award for "Worst smelling for the longest duration".<br />
<br />
I can't even figure out what to layer this with to fix it up...wild.<br />
Regerts.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2211644"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2211644#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2211618" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2211618" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FujiMoto"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2119923"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2119923.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FujiMoto" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Fragrance-One/Date-For-Men-58376.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.58376.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Date For Men"title="Date For Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2211618ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2211618" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2119923">FujiMoto</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-08">07/08/24 03:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nauseating, cloying vanilla that dries down to piss? <br />
No idea why Tom Ford would release such a thing, embarrassing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2211618"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2211618#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2210315" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2200729" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Alienolympiasprayer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2169474"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Alienolympiasprayer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/Alien-707.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.707.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Alien"title="Alien"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2200729ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2200729" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2169474">Alienolympiasprayer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-27">06/27/24 00:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Dont let the beautiful bottle of this perfume fool you. You would assume this perfume would be slightly worth the amount of money you pay for it but unfortunately thats not the case. Tom ford in my opinion makes their perfumes and colognes too zoomed in one one ingredient. In this case this perfume literally smells like a raw vanilla bean. Please, any readers out there dont be confused, a raw vanilla bean is not pleasant at all. Go in your cabinet and put your vanilla extract to your nose. Yeah amd how much is Tom Ford selling this for? Its offputting. If youre wanting to smell sexy, beautiful, or even half decent I would avoid this cheap, dollarstore rendition of vanilla extract.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2197556" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="evavidal62"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1917831"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="evavidal62" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Coco-Eau-de-Parfum-609.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.609.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Coco Eau de Parfum"title="Coco Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2197556ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2197556" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1917831">evavidal62</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-23">06/23/24 18:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For your vanilla fix, this is a pure vanilla, only vanilla; thousand times vanilla fragrance. It's ok for the vanilla main theme lovers. But otherwise quite boring, generic and ridiculously overprice for just vanilla. It's not a gourmand vanilla because it would have other gourmand notes to support or gather around that vanilla accord i.e. coffee, praline, chocolate, marzipan, fruit notes, etc. This is all about the vanilla. It has vague very far in the background faint florals, possibly white florals but wisps of them; quite small. It has some nutty almond but subdued. It also has some wood in the dry down which comes in rather quick. This is a short ride through vanilla town. But it's nothing special. I don't find this particularly appealing. I sampled it via the sample tests free when one is looking/browsing through the Tom Ford scents at Macy's. This would have been a lot better if they had added honey, brown sugar, other gourmand notes or more distinctive specific florals or fruit. As it is it's just very dull vanilla and powder notes. It is clean and smooth but nothing sex/sexual about it. For it to be sexy they needed some oomph something to give it some real hot flavor. Some spices would have been nice. Some generous musk. It is only for the vanilla addicts.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2197556"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2197556#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2195643" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2195643" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="teslax62"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1022849"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1022849.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="teslax62" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Grey-Vetiver-6697.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6697.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Grey Vetiver"title="Grey Vetiver"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2195643ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2195643" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); Smells like a realistic nutty vanilla Milkshake . Very good actually . <br />
<br />
Price is rediculas but the scent is damn good .<br />
<br />
Performance is crazy good , Still as strong as the opening around 7 hours later ,You will have no problem smelling this one on yourself . <br />
<br />
Received a comment that i (Smell like candy)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2195643"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2195643#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2195491" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2193811" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="honeyedclover"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1758124"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1758124.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="honeyedclover" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Noble-Blush-98937.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.98937.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Noble Blush"title="Noble Blush"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2193811ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2193811" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1758124">honeyedclover</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-20">06/20/24 00:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>You apply Vanilla Bean Noel body butter by Bath and Body Works on your feet, put on some cheap socks, and then have a 30-minute walk during a heatwave. You return home, kicking off your shoes now permeated with cheap synthetic vanillin and lightly sour foot sweat. But you step straight into Play-Doh your toddler has left unattended and out of its container on the stairs. Exasperated, you peel off your socks and assess the mess, tediously trying to pick out the Play-Doh from the sock's fabric, sweaty, frustrated, and confused. The scent of the sock wafts into your nose. And it smells just like Tom Ford's Vanilla Sex.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2193811"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2193811#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2193576" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2193576" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KristinaAlexis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2111820"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="KristinaAlexis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chinatown-1300.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1300.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chinatown"title="Chinatown"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2193576ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2193576" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); It's a darker, smoky vanilla that never stumbles into adolescence.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2192533"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2192533#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2191187" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Nothing but a replica in a gilded bottle. Well, definitely not worth to buy a bottle than the fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2186525"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2186525#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2186046" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2186046" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SuperSueChick"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/43791"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.43791.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SuperSueChick" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2186046ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2186046" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/43791">SuperSueChick</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-12">06/12/24 11:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Okay, this opens STRONG.<br />
First minute or two all I could smell was vanilla, cowhide leather, and pistachios.<br />
Smelled like Cabellas or some cowboy store with boots and vanilla wax candles.<br />
<br />
5 mins later: vanilla, beef jerkey, and nutty. <br />
<br />
10-15 mins that strong wild leather scent started to calm down. I get a hint of TF's 'Lost Cherry' because of the sweet almond. <br />
<br />
About 30 mins to an hour into it, it smelled like a new luxury vehicle. The leather w/vanilla smell so delicious and creamy. The nuttiness blends well with the vanilla. And it so smooth and definitely a 180 from its harsh opening. <br />
<br />
2-4 hours it reminded me of Yes I Am Glorious by Cacharel.  Not as feminine or sweet, but it shares the smooth toasted coconut (bc of the Almond note) and vanilla cream smoothness, and a tiny touch of flowery.<br />
<br />
Its not loud. It won't leave a trail.<br />
Office appropriate.<br />
Male/Female<br />
I'd say for a person 30yrs old and above. Not "young" vibes.<br />
Preferably cooler weather, but okay for a calm evening anytime. <br />
Its not "fun", its calm and cozy. I can see it used on a date because its a pretty scent. <br />
<br />
Not sure why they picked "sex" in the name, unless one really likes Vanilla and thats your thing for sexy.<br />
Personally, I would round it up to the nearest 'Pretty unisex scent'.  But scent is subjective so <br />
<br />
4 to 6 Hours it turns to a soft soapy skin scent. <br />
Its nice. <br />
<br />
That's my review, hope it helps.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2186046"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2186046#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2183375" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2183375" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dv_67"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1741279"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="dv_67" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kayali-Fragrances/Vanilla-28-52616.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52616.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla 28"title="Vanilla 28"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2183375ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2183375" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1777028">essenceofthescent</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-08">06/08/24 17:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ok it definitely did not deserve fragrance of the year, HOWEVER, it is definitely one of the better vanillas on the market! I dislike the strong almondy opening, which almost smells plastic-y, but after 20 minutes have passed, the vanilla is absolutely lush. Trust me guys, spray her and leave her alone for 20 minutes and then give her a smell! You will not be disappointed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2182431"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2182431#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2181179" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2048151">civxrlys</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-06">06/06/24 08:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Apparently this perfume won the award Fragrance of the Year by Universal Luxury at 2024 Fragrance Foundation Awards.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2179933"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2179933#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2173119" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2173119" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Chloerose666"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1950146"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1950146.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Chloerose666" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jovoy-Paris/Remember-Me-49435.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49435.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Remember Me"title="Remember Me"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2173119ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2173119" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1950146">Chloerose666</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-31">05/31/24 00:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Christ this is bad. I thought people were being a bit too harsh on the Tom Ford reviews but lmaoooo this absolutely reeks of like condoms??! medicinal vibes? maybe even embalming fluid?! the fuck???<br />
<br />
Definitely not very vanilla-y which is laughable given the name and the notes.<br />
<br />
If you're looking for a sassy vanilla DO NOT buy this lmao do yourself a favour and get Guerlain SDV or YSL Babycat or Fire at Will.. or Vanilla 28, or D&amp;G Devotion Intense.. or literally any of the other million vanillas ffs :')<br />
<br />
If someone wore this around me and it smelled anywhere near what it smelled like on my skin I would tell them to go take a shower. Thank Christ it is super expensive otherwise you'd be smelling this in the wild!!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2173119"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2173119#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2172140" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1994030">Yuyulia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-30">05/30/24 02:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smelled it in store to see what all the hype about and omg smelled like sweat or urine..sometimes it feels like Tom Ford in perfumery is like balenciaga in fashion</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2171892"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2171892#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2168544" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2168544" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kotikina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1498532"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1498532.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kotikina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Attar-Collection/Khaltat-Night-38133.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38133.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Khaltat Night"title="Khaltat Night"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2168544ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2168544" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1498532">Kotikina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-26">05/26/24 12:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>From love to hatred in less than 30 minutes...<br />
Beautiful opening, creamy almonds, (no smell of cyanide like in bitter almonds/amaretto), + that lactonic vanilla similar to the one in Metallique.Wow!<br />
In less than 30 minutes on a blotter it turned into that 'public toilet' smell indeed, like people already noted below. Yuck.<br />
...And I am not even that picky when it comes to perfumes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2168544"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2168544#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2167843" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2167843" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bellalandia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2091211"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2091211.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="bellalandia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Regime-des-Fleurs/Himitsu-72664.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72664.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Himitsu"title="Himitsu"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2167843ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2167843" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2091211">bellalandia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-25">05/25/24 17:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This scent is a very interesting idea of vanilla but it matches tom ford perfectly. I notice all of the perfumes have this DNA that it was created by the same person. This does smell like what tom ford thought of the idea of a nice, sexy vanilla.<br />
Vanilla Sex surprised me since everyone and their mom hate this scent wholeheartedly. I actually like it. Its more of a almond perfume. Almond is nutty and smoky, maybe even roasted. Vanilla is powdery and dry. Its a strong smell that I can imagine, can give someone a headache. The most prominent profile to me is tonka bean. Its very strong. As well as almond- bitter and roasted on some fire. <br />
I personally like it. It smells a bit like vanillary that i personally own but stopped using because of headache it gives me. <br />
I feel like a lot of people like this sugary, youthful, sweet vanilla in perfumes and can be judgmental towards mature, almondy vanilla like this one. If you have sweet tooth, it might be not for you. Its not a sweet gourmand. But its lovely. I dont know if i am so fond of this because i had THE WORST idea in my head of how this might smell or if its actually that good. Well well. I guess well never know (yes that is kanye reference)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2167843"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2167843#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2167503" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2167503" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Anastuki"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1934757"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1934757.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Anastuki" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2167503ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2167503" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1934757">Anastuki</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-25">05/25/24 09:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This doesn't smell cheap, neither smells similar to Hypnotic Poison... I m voting this as a fragnance and not as how it is priced, because obviously it is overpriced. It's opening with bitter almond that mix with lots of vanilla and gives this marzipan like smell... It is beast mode on me , lasts lots of hours and projects really well, I sprayed this on and they asked me 2 rooms far what did I put on and that it smells amazing... That's my 2 cents on it, definitely TRY before you buy. Perfumery is very subjective and we don't all have the same pH.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2167503"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2167503#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2167494" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Too exp for designer brand</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2163632"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2163632#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2162220" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2162220" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="asiarakk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1305265"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1305265.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="asiarakk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2162220ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2162220" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1305265">asiarakk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-20">05/20/24 12:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A disappointment for me. Some time ago I was a huge wan of TF. But after they started to do overhyped fragrances just to make a lot of money <br />
Peach,cherry, now vanilla. This one is so masculine for me. An epitome of a bad taste. Cyanide bitter almonds in the start.. and I dont even want to start. But the base notes smells disgusting. And I truly can imagine huge amount of fans of this one. Its not bad, I think all the scents can the right to exist. <br />
It will suits super young and plasticky beautiful woman who really take care of herself, something like 30 y.o. slavic bimbo or mob wife in a fur coat and Hermes bag. If you know what I mean. Sugar daddy is included in the set.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2162220"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2162220#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2161691" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2161691"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2161691#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2160218" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2160218" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hellebelle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1239084"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1239084.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hellebelle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lush/What-Would-Love-Do-50163.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50163.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="What Would Love Do"title="What Would Love Do"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2160218ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2160218" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1239084">hellebelle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-18">05/18/24 13:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is fine. It isnt disgusting, does not smell like vomit, or pee; or urinal cakes. It smells almost exactly like Acqua di Parma Mandorlo di Sicilia to me, and theres nothing offensive about it. I dont really understand the outrage over the price and the dumb name. Tom Fords line has been shock-jocky kitsch for young people with more money than sense for a long time now, so all the huffy fury over Vanilla Sex just seems performative to me. If this was released by any other department store brand, I suspect many of the nay-sayers would be all over it. Obviously, blind buying this would be foolish. <br />
<br />
Edited: Okay, I can see how the almondy, marzipan note that might remind some of cherry urinal cakes.  But not any more so than anything else with such a note- Hypnotic Poison, Mandorlo di Sicilia, etc. I havent spent much time in mens rooms and I dont know if it would have crossed my mind if I hadnt been looking for it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Smelled it again yesterday and for the faintest moment it was pleasant, but then a wave of moldy play-doh and nasty cheese hit and I was back to wanting to puke. To my horror, I accidentally got some on me while I was spraying a tester. The scent stayed for hours I'll give it that, but it was so strong my dinner was mildly unpleasant. If this is what sex is like I'll die a virgin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2158447"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2158447#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2158094" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1561355">FragranceSigma</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-16">05/16/24 11:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like the danish dish "risalamande". Layer this with Lost cherry which smells like the cherry sauce you put on top, and you smell like the entire dish.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2158094"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2158094#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2156499" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2156499" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Detman101"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1374575"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1374575.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Detman101" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Jasoor-85093.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.85093.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jasoor"title="Jasoor"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2156499ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2156499" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1374575">Detman101</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-15">05/15/24 04:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tried and tried to get to a store to sample this, no chance...So I ordered a 10ml decant.<br />
I really hope this smells good. I'm a sucker for Vanilla, and this decant just cost a full bottle of something else...lol.<br />
<br />
Review to follow...<br />
<br />
17MAY24 <br />
(Arrival Day)<br />
Oooookay....so it has arrived...my $50 little bundle of disappointment.<br />
I am angry.<br />
Not because this was so expensive.<br />
Well....a little...I could have bought the new "Bianco Latte" clone for what I paid for this stupid little 10ml decant. I'm kicking myself because I didn't press hard enough to get my lazy butt to a store and smell this stupid fragrance before ordering a decant!!<br />
<br />
But I am mostly...and hugely angry....because I ALREADY HAD THIS EXACT VANILLA!!!<br />
<br />
I have been making this EXACT friggin vanilla fragrance for over a year now!! Trying to get it right and get rid of all the things wrong with it.<br />
That slightly herbal, medicinal, doll-head, plasticky, creamy but artificial smelling, fake vanilla note that I CANT GET RID OF!!!<br />
<br />
I didn't wear the one that I made because I couldn't get rid of that lingering plasticky artificial doll-head smell in the composition.<br />
<br />
I guess I'm not such an abysmal rookie if I can make something for $10 that smells exactly like what these feebs are selling for $400 a bottle. <br />
Unfrigginbelievable....they have the NERVE to sell this crap for megabucks!?!? <br />
<br />
I'm so darn mad right now....augh.<br />
Completely swindled...this is the last time I'm ever messing with "Tom Ford" anything. <br />
Friggin crap...I should have listened to the reviews.<br />
I'll just add this 10ml decant to my own crappy doll-head-vanilla fragrance bottle. <br />
I guess I can call mine "Vanilla Chex"...lol<br />
  <br />
2/10 (I wish I never...)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2156499"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2156499#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2153192" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2153192" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NightshiftGhost"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2052417"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2052417.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NightshiftGhost" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guess/Guess-Seductive-Noir-Women-56992.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56992.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Guess Seductive Noir Women"title="Guess Seductive Noir Women"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2153192ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2153192" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2052417">NightshiftGhost</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-11">05/11/24 20:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sampled this at a store. Such rich, rich vanilla. So rich it almost had little to no sweetness to it. That is the top and middle note. Which smells nice and unique to be honest. What I don't like is the base notes of it.<br />
<br />
This fragrance has depth. A depth of burnt almonds and rubber. An odor that I find stomach turning, thick, and heavy. However, I couldn't stop sniffing the test strip every few minutes, not because I liked it, but because I was almost fascinated by such a weird and confusing combination of scents.<br />
<br />
It's not a "No" for me, it's more like a "What??". I can't even name other perfumes that remind me of it. So uh... Sample before you buy I guess? (If there's anyone who blind buys 250$+ priced perfumes)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2153192"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2153192#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2152096" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Its quite brutal though <br />
And then it goes into vanilla pudding with almond milk/ice cream for hours. People around you will like it - who doesnt like vanilla pudding smell? But is that a true, pure vanilla? Absolutely not<br />
I love vanilla note-dominated fragrances, this aint one</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2152096"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2152096#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2151378" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I love it, but not for the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2150246"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2150246#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2147868" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2147868" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scratch &amp; Sniff"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1878218"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1878218.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scratch &amp; Sniff" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2147868ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2147868" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1878218">Scratch &amp; Sniff</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-06">05/06/24 17:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Vanilla Sex achieved the opposite of its intention, and instead made me go immediately limp upon smelling it.<br />
<br />
Horrendous.  Unappetizing and unappealing in the worst possible way, this might just be the most disgusting fragrance that has ever seared my nostrils.  This vanilla is sexless, and it smells like a used condom was filled with almonds and cheap vanilla hand soap, lit on fire in an alleyway, and thrown into a NYC dumpster.  Which is apropos, since this fragrance itself is a dumpster fire.  The smell of sweaty nuts themselves would be preferable to this horrifically overpriced ($250 to $395) olfactory assault of burnt nuts and stale vanilla.<br />
<br />
I hope this will be the final nail in the coffin of Tom Fords fragrance line, which becomes more mediocre and less relevant with every passing year.  Tom Ford is over, yall.<br />
<br />
In five words or less: A nutty, nausea-inducing nightmare.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2147868"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2147868#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2146738" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1986019">kaelah</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-05">05/05/24 14:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I went to Neiman Marcus recently just to window shop (since they're soo expensive lol) and I saw this perfume displayed and it had a tester with it. It smelled amazing until I checked the price. This perfume is absurdly priced for no reason. Their so many cheaper options that smell the same or better. Tom Ford is insane for pricing a perfume this high.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2146738"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2146738#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2146719" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2146719" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bajdur"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1732720"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bajdur" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Francesca-Bianchi/Byzantine-Amber-79763.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.79763.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Byzantine Amber"title="Byzantine Amber"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2146719ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2146719" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1732720">Bajdur</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-05">05/05/24 14:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nothing special, I can't believe it costs so much for almost nothing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2146719"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2146719#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2145037" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2145037" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="wesleyhclark"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/410918"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.410918.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="wesleyhclark" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Alfa-Romeo-Perfumes/Black-70093.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70093.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black"title="Black"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2145037ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2145037" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/410918">wesleyhclark</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-03">05/03/24 20:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Can we just call this "Vanilla" and leave off the hype, please? That's all it is. If this is the kind of thing you want, go to an Anthropologie and get yourself a small bottle of the far, far less expensive Outremer Vanille and call it a day. Same stuff.  Or - dab some vanilla extract behind your ears.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2145037"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2145037#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2144118" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
