padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1967130">mzhyde</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-03">05/03/24 04:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells great on the drydown. But first 30 minutes smell very bad.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2144118"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2144118#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2143684" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2143684" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rose_nymph"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1706783"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1706783.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="rose_nymph" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88588.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla Sex"title="Vanilla Sex"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2143684ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2143684" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1706783">rose_nymph</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-02">05/02/24 14:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Don't smell it on paper. Smell it on your skin.<br />
I have been obsessed with this fragrance. I was running around the mall with my husband, and suddenly the intercom comes on saying 'Thanks for visiting! The mall is now closed!'. We went through Nordstrom to get to the parking lot. I walked by the Tom Ford stand and saw the array of testers, and sprayed it all over just for fun.<br />
<br />
I felt sexy, expensive, delicious. This heightens libido. <br />
I do not know why this gets so much hate. I have never smelled a vanilla fragrance like this. Yes, at first, you get that deep vanilla. But there's this strange sensual, erotic, rubbery - condom like scent that comes through. Milky, almond-y. Don't let that put you off. This makes you feel like some seductive, soft princess in an ivory tower. <br />
I gave in and bought the 30ml a few days ago. This could also be a fantastic layering scent. Will be trying to layer this with a rose perfume to combine a fresh rose smell with this erotic vanilla.<br />
9/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2143684"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2143684#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2143460" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2143460" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jow012"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1722924"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1722924.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jow012" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2143460ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2143460" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); My bf and I both just looked at each other and said "no". On the paper it smelled incredibly artificial and I think it's because of the almond. Why would this be priced at $500? Even if one wants to smell like Vanilla and almonds, you can do so with many other perfumes priced at a fraction.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2143460"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2143460#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2141564" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; astralmonad87020 hours ago<br />
<br />
Play-dough. Why are people comparing this to Perris Monte Carlo's Vanille de Tahiti which is a gourmand masterpiece? Don't try to put crappy designer and artful niche fragrances in the same category when they're on different levels."<br />
<br />
Hmmm...<br />
Perris Monte Carlo - Vanille de Tahiti and their vanilla version is so pale and superficial that I dare say there is nothing attractive or artistically "niche" about it. To be more precise, I have nothing against a good designer fragrance overshadowing a synthetic mess made by a niche brand...<br />
Just saying</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2141488"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2141488#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2140584" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1775129">Watchthethrone</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-29">04/29/24 20:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not even bad bruh why yall hating on this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2140577"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2140577#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2139156" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2139156" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="supersaiyan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1173235"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1173235.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="supersaiyan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Ange-ou-Demon-Poesie-d-un-Parfum-d-Hiver-Santal-d-Hiver-10323.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10323.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ange ou Demon Poesie dun Parfum dHiver Santal dHiver"title="Ange ou Demon Poesie dun Parfum dHiver Santal dHiver"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2139156ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2139156" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1173235">supersaiyan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-28">04/28/24 12:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The dry down is a rich, smokey vanilla with a slightly animalic musk and floral (champaca). In fact, it smells like a near dead ringer for Vanille de Tahiti. The openings are extremely different though. The opening of VdT is very animalic and indolic and many describe it as fecal, but I personally love it. The opening is Vanilla Sex (I hate the name!!) is smokey, powdery and stale vanilla. Then it goes through a phase where these gorgeous musky notes come alive, they smell quite alive. I know theres no official musk note but it smells like that to me. The musk is kind of like a toned down version of Lush Vanillary and Nasomattos Sadonaso, as in that saliva scent profile but it reads much more like musk in Vanilla Sex. Im surprised to see there are some people who have voted these fragrances as similar but even more that disagree! They are not dupes by any means but that saliva-y vanilla is definitely present in all three scents - I believe it is the aroma chemical used for the vanilla may be the same. <br />
<br />
The indolic flowers in VdT translate to the musk in Vanilla Sex. Overall, Im happy with my bottle of VdT and prefer the scent of it to Vanilla Sex. I also prefer the price tag and the name of the perfume!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2139156"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2139156#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2139096" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Was between this, Fucking Fabulous, Bitter Peach, and Neroli Portofino, I really liked this scent because it seemed different compared to the rest. Should I have spent $300+ for this? Hell no, but am I satisfied? Sort of. The Vanilla in this perfume pops off and I rly fw the dry down. However it is not worth all of the money. I could've bought a Mind games fragrance or a bunch of Mancera's and Xerjoff's.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2138674"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2138674#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2138562" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It smells artificial and like playdough. I would possibly purchase this if it were under $50, but $395 for a small size of this? padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2134280" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LEM922"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1275562"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1275562.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LEM922" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2134280ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2134280" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1275562">LEM922</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-23">04/23/24 18:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Glad I didnt blindly pull the trigger on this. <br />
<br />
I smelled it at Sephora yesterday, and it was god awful. It had this strange funk to it like sour, rotten milk. I was shocked. Surely, this is some kind of mistake? Someone said yep, this is it and pushed it through? Unbelievable, honestly. And it sucks because I love the packaging, I love vanilla, I really wanted to like it and hopefully add it to my collection, but absolutely not. Something about this smells off, and Im not sure what exactly the note is, but it was apparent from the moment I sprayed it. Just bad all around. What a shame.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2134280"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2134280#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2132123" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2128948" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Noice"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1361746"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1361746.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Noice" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2128948ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2128948" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1361746">Noice</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-18">04/18/24 18:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>FYI the concentration of Vanilla Sex is (23.822616%) Does not perform like a 20~ percenter tho <br />
<br />
*It "appears" that some Tom Ford formulations created by &amp; or with molecules from Givaudan list Fragrance (Parfum) n% on the back (country-specific-label).<br />
i.e., Vanilla Sex, Cherry Smoke.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2128948"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2128948#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2128526" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2128526" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ferra_Verto"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1160884"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ferra_Verto" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zara/Hypnotic-Vanilla-85038.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.85038.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hypnotic Vanilla"title="Hypnotic Vanilla"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2128526ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2128526" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1160884">Ferra_Verto</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-18">04/18/24 10:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Gilded baking vanilla with heavy almond extract. Stays very linear and becomes even more vanillic as it dries down. Medium projection, I have to wave my wrist in my face to get a whiff of my little sample.<br />
Price is not justified at all given the paltry longevity, but, the scent is warm and inviting, and perfectly suited for the cool/cold holiday months. Very nostalgic and feel-good too. <br />
I'd sample if interested, but unless the formula is tweaked to harken back to the OG longevity of TF fragrances of old, it's not worth it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2128526"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2128526#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2126009" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2126009" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="netosan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1377279"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1377279.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="netosan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2126009ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2126009" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1377279">netosan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-15">04/15/24 22:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bath and body works smell.<br />
Identical.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2126009"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2126009#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2125900" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2125571"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2125571#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2125507" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2125507" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bil00l"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1727415"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="bil00l" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Noir-Extreme-Parfum-75489.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75489.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Noir Extreme Parfum"title="Noir Extreme Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2125507ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2125507" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1727415">bil00l</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-15">04/15/24 11:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just tested this, you definitely get the vanilla and the sex it smells like a basic vanilla smell but with a hint of a slightly sweet natural humanlike smell (from doing a certain activity). Its not suitable for men in my opinion, I would not wear a scent like this. It definitely leans feminine. As a scent on its own, its not bad, but when you include the price its extortionate for the quality of scent you get. The vanilla doesnt smell especially real. That, paired with the slightly almond-y quality could probably be found in a much cheaper perfume. The huge number of downvotes are not justified, it seems that people like to hate on something without smelling it. Also, I didnt get any floral notes, only the vanilla, the nuts (pun intended) and the sweets. This is the type of perfume youd pay for just to get the brand name. In terms of how much the scent is really worth, Id pay up to 50 for this smell, as a gift.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2125507"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2125507#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="88588" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent2000806" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2000806" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Idealauras"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1235206"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1235206.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Idealauras" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Victoria-Beckham-Beauty/21-50-Reverie-97667.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.97667.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="21:50 Rverie"title="21:50 Rverie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2000806ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2000806" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1235206">Idealauras</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-14">12/14/23 00:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Creamy,  almondy, sandalwood VANILLA oriented scent. <br />
<br />
The almond / tonka notes give me smooth amoretto vibes.<br />
Also / contrastingly, but at the same time- maybe even more like the vanilla ice cream in a root beer float, but somehow isolated, and without the root beer.<br />
<br />
It seems to radiate a creamy heat of a  grown up (again) amoretto topped vanilla ice cream on my skin.<br />
<br />
 Its surprisingly unusual (imo) and one of the people in my life who does not usually like sweet fragrances told me he is shocked to like this and complimented it on me, asking to smell it over and over again.<br />
He is not the only person in my life who has complimented it in the first two days of me having it that is not usually interested in this sort of fragrance, either.<br />
<br />
 Its not SUPER sweet, but its still SOFTLY sweet and very creamy and nutty.<br />
<br />
Predictably; its an amazing layering scent!<br />
One spray of lost cherry with 2 sprays of this smells like the most amazing warm cherry pie with fancy ice cream!<br />
<br />
I also tried it with Eben Fume and it made it a sweeter vanilla woodsy scent that I love!<br />
Really nice extra creaminess w Plum Japonais and Cafe Rose, too.<br />
I see limitless potential for layering like this and that versatility is exciting for me.<br />
<br />
Its not a tough wear, or an intellectual fragrance (of course). Its a simple one, but beautifully done and really delightful.<br />
<br />
The bottle and color is super cute in my collection of TF , and I can tell I will be reaching for this one often - its a no brainer. An easy fragrance to wear, with the silly name - that will probably be quite successful for those reasons.<br />
<br />
Out of the newer TF releases, it is definitely my favorite from the past half decade or so. <br />
BUT I love simple vanilla fragrances. <br />
(Tihota is my #1 and btw this is nothing like that, that being a benzoin /musc/ vanilla). <br />
<br />
Definitely not understanding the Babycat comparisons<br />
<br />
All around, very nice!<br />
But I am that audience that loves Tom ford and gourmands / vanillas<br />
<br />
Safe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2000806"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2000806#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1994476" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Cant wait!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="1994476"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=1994476#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2052597" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2052597" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jytong"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1134001"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1134001.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jytong" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kayali-Fragrances/Oudgasm-Rose-Oud-16-Eau-de-Parfum-Intense-85186.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.85186.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oudgasm Rose Oud | 16 Eau de Parfum Intense"title="Oudgasm Rose Oud | 16 Eau de Parfum Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2052597ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2052597" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1134001">jytong</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-05">02/05/24 03:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tried Vanilla Sex on for the first time 10 days ago while browsing at the department store and didnt expect to like it so much. I remember spraying my wrists and then going Oooh not bad! Then I continued shopping for the next two hours and couldnt stop sniffing my wrists. Im telling you, I was sniffing myself every couple seconds. I felt perplexed. I definitely enjoyed the scent but was it worth the exorbitant price tag? I had to walk away.<br />
<br />
A week passes and I still cannot get the fragrance out of my head. I had a gift card from my birthday which had HKD$1500 (~$190USD) on it, so with that, I opted to get the 30ml bottle which costed $2040 (~$260USD), meaning I still had to fork out $540 (~$70USD) of my own money. <br />
<br />
The bottle just arrived at my doorstep and I immediately opened and gave myself a good 8-10 sprays on both sides of my arms, neck and behind the ears. Ive been sitting with the fragrance for close to an hour and it is absolutely delightful on my skin. It is an almond leaning vanilla scent and is giving vanilla bean milkshake on me. <br />
<br />
I am so happy to have and able to enjoy it. The scent is very comforting to me and makes me happy </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2052597"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2052597#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2075283" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2075283" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="caitrun"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/188666"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.188666.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="caitrun" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-Dua-Brand/Holiday-Vanilla-Delight-93401.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93401.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Holiday Vanilla Delight"title="Holiday Vanilla Delight"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2075283ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2075283" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/188666">caitrun</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-26">02/26/24 21:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>People's reviews are cracking me up... I think most folks must not realize that vanilla sex is a saying about traditional mission-style sex, not kinky sex. Therefore, this lovely, musky-vanilla with a nice indole undertone is aptly named vanilla sex. If you are looking for dark and dirty, you misunderstood the name.<br />
<br />
P.S. If you like TF's Vanilla Sex, but not the price tag, check out Dua's Intimate with Vanilla, dead ringer and great longevity!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2075283"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2075283#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2167843" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2167843" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bellalandia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2091211"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2091211.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="bellalandia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Regime-des-Fleurs/Himitsu-72664.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72664.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Himitsu"title="Himitsu"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2167843ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2167843" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2091211">bellalandia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-25">05/25/24 17:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This scent is a very interesting idea of vanilla but it matches tom ford perfectly. I notice all of the perfumes have this DNA that it was created by the same person. This does smell like what tom ford thought of the idea of a nice, sexy vanilla.<br />
Vanilla Sex surprised me since everyone and their mom hate this scent wholeheartedly. I actually like it. Its more of a almond perfume. Almond is nutty and smoky, maybe even roasted. Vanilla is powdery and dry. Its a strong smell that I can imagine, can give someone a headache. The most prominent profile to me is tonka bean. Its very strong. As well as almond- bitter and roasted on some fire. <br />
I personally like it. It smells a bit like vanillary that i personally own but stopped using because of headache it gives me. <br />
I feel like a lot of people like this sugary, youthful, sweet vanilla in perfumes and can be judgmental towards mature, almondy vanilla like this one. If you have sweet tooth, it might be not for you. Its not a sweet gourmand. But its lovely. I dont know if i am so fond of this because i had THE WORST idea in my head of how this might smell or if its actually that good. Well well. I guess well never know (yes that is kanye reference)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="2167843"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=2167843#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="88588" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>

Oudgasm, vanilla sex, etc. I understand if it is just a few, but this year everything is either 'goddess' for mainstream perfumes, or something sex related for niche. <br />
The notes sound good nevertheless.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="1993735"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=1993735#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1996118" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1996118" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fragrance_obsession"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1865922"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="fragrance_obsession" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1996118ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1996118" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1865922">fragrance_obsession</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-08">12/08/23 13:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opening was a strong musky / spicy with a faint vanilla. Then transitions to a balsamic vanilla. Dry down is a very unisex, mature, sandalwoody vanilla. Not sweet nor cloying. Overall the muskiness/spiciness and woodiness overpowers the vanilla. Doesnt last on me though.<br />
<br />
Key notes: Vanilla Tincture India, Vanilla Absolute, Sandalwood Essence</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="1996118"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=1996118#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1995060" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1995060" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alessandraj18"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1486534"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1486534.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="alessandraj18" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1995060ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck8x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1995060" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1486534">alessandraj18</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-07">12/07/23 10:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sex Sells is so overdone in our current world and market. I know if someone is using something provocative or edgy to sell a product.its because that product isnt very good. <br />
<br />
This is literally Burberry Goddess if she became bitter in the sun. 3/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="88588"comment_id="1995060"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Vanilla-Sex-88588.html?ccid=1995060#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="88588" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

</div>
        
        <div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Reviews</span></div>

    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });

</script>
